references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine-tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work in DreamCache because it introduces the concept of fine-tuning text-to-image diffusion models for personalized generation, which DreamCache builds upon with its own finetuning-free approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly influential as it introduces the Stable Diffusion model, the backbone for DreamCache's personalized image generation.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper significantly advances the state-of-the-art in text-to-image generation and DreamCache leverages the architecture and pretrained weights from this model.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a critical component of many personalized image generation methods, including DreamCache, for aligning text and image embeddings.
This paper introduces the foundational concepts of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are the basis for many modern text-to-image generation models, including the one used in DreamCache.
